Author: SwampHag4589
Text: Stop weighing yourself every day. You can lose 2lbs by taking a proper dump. You can fluctuate by as much as 3lbs in a single day. Obsessing over your daily weight is a great way to torture yourself. Try weighing yourself weekly or biweekly.

Author: Flesh-And-Bone
Text: I understand your struggle and sympathize. There are days when I step on the scale and the number is high, but I can feel myself leaning out and I can see a difference in the mirror.
